page.title: 19MYSTERIES OF THE AREA
page.content: There are many ghosts in our area. One of the ghosts many people know is called the pink lady. The pink lady is supposed to have drowned people in the mere, this is the pond in Wickham Skeith which is now called the Grimmer. She was dressed in pink. Her dress covered her feet. She used to ride in a carriage there was a pink lantern on each side of it.One day some people drowned her.Now she haunts the people in the village. There is a house called White Gates which is haunted.Strange noises are heard as you walk by. There is another haunted house in the village it is called Street Farm. There is a ghost.It is a friendly ghost and it stares at the person who is sleeping in the room.
